skills.name: Slashing Air
skills.description: Strikes an enemy with a dull blade, weakening the target's Attack Power for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Spinning Slash
skills.description: Spins around to attack all enemies. Enemies that receive a Critical Hit by this attack will be denied of HP recovery for 2 turns.

skills.name: Oasis's Blessing
skills.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 25% each. This skill will also create a shield that absorbs damage and increases your Attack Power for 3 turns. The Shield amount is proportionate to your level.

skills.name: Charming Voice
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, stealing all beneficial effects and sets all of the enemy's skills on max cooldown time. If the skill didn't set the enemy's skills on max cooldown time, the cooldown time of the [Charming Voice] will reset.

skills.description: Attacks the enemy and decreases its Attack Power for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Sweet Dreams
skills.description: Attacks an enemy. This attack has a 75% chance to remove all beneficial effect and puts the target to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.description: Resets the Attack Bar of the enemy target and decreases the Attack Bar of the other enemies by 30% each. Also puts all enemies to sleep for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with the flames of punishment, inflicting Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Decelerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance on each target.

skills.name: Ice Bolt
skills.description: Shoots an Ice arrow at the enemy.

skills.name: Snowstorm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a storm of ice, dealing damage proportionate to your Defense and freezing them for 1 turn with a 60% chance.

skills.name: Absolute Zero
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a gust of freezing wind, dealing damage proportionate to your Defense and setting the enemies' Attack Bar to 0. Additionally, the enemies are frozen for 1 turn.

skills.name: Fire Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a Fire arrow at the enemy.

skills.name: Rain of Fire
skills.description: Burns enemies with a Fire shower and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 25% chance for each attack.

skills.name: Fiery Breath
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a fiery breath and puts their skills on cool down.

skills.name: Thunder Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a Lightning arrow at the enemy.

skills.name: Thunder Break
skills.description: Attacks the enemy to inflict damage proportionate to the target's MAX HP and attacks all enemies once again with 20% of the damage. Additionally, this attack has a 40% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Power for 2 turns.

skills.name: Illusion of Time
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects of all allies and all ally skills will become instantly available. [Illusion of Time] will not be affected by cooldown reducing or increasing skills.

skills.name: Holy Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a Light arrow at the enemy.

skills.name: Holy Light
skills.description: Calls upon the holy power of light, healing all allies by 15% of their HP and also removing 2 harmful effects from each ally. Light attribute allies will receive doubled amount of healing.

skills.name: Armageddon
skills.description: Redistributes the HP of all enemies, excluding the Boss, and sacrifices half of your current HP to deal damage proportionate to the sacrificed HP to all enemies.

skills.name: Aim Body
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

skills.name: Aim Head
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. The inflicted damage increases by 15% per harmful effect granted on the enemy.

skills.name: Master of Hunting (Passive)
skills.description: Weakens the enemy's Defense for 1 turn if you attack the enemy with no beneficial effects and freezes the enemy for 1 turn if you attack the enemy under a harmful effect. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Dark Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a Dark arrow at the enemy.

skills.name: Dark Storm
skills.description: Summons a storm of darkness to attack all enemies 4 times. Each attack has a 15% chance to stun.

skills.name: Decimate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of darkness. This skill deals 100% increased Critical Damage on Critical Hits and the defeated enemy can't be revived.

skills.name: Aim Body
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

skills.name: Aim Weak Spot
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Leaves the Branding Effect for 2 turns if the target has higher MAX HP than that of yours.

skills.name: Hawk's Eye (Passive)
skills.description: Inflicts damage that ignores the target's Defense with a 20% chance with every attack. The chance increases by 15% for every harmful effect granted on the target, up to 50%. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Decelerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance on each target.

skills.name: Shooting Star
skills.description: Summons shooting stars that attack enemies randomly. The inflicted damage increases as the same target gets hit again.

skills.name: Aim Body
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

skills.name: Aim Head
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. The inflicted damage increases by 15% per harmful effect granted on the enemy.

skills.name: Destruction Wedge
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an arrow that can't be removed and removes all beneficial effects granted on the enemy, weakens Defense for 2 turns and increases the chances of landing a glancing hit for 2 turns with a 90% chance each. In addition, increases your Attack Bar by 50% if you attack with a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a burning flame, inflicting Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Inflicts great damage by blowing up the Continuous Damage effects on the enemy. The inflicted damage increases by 50% for each effect.

skills.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

skills.name: Aim Weak Spot
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. Leaves the Branding Effect for 2 turns if the target has higher MAX HP than that of yours.

skills.name: Silver Light
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with arrows of light. The faster your Attack Speed compared to the enemy's, the greater damage you can inflict.

skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Decelerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance on each target.

skills.name: Pep Talk
skills.description: Increases the Attack Power and Defense of all allies for 3 turns.

skills.name: Aim Body
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that ignores all damage reduction effects.

skills.name: Aim Head
skills.description: Attacks an enemy to disturb HP recovery for 2 turns. The inflicted damage increases by 15% per harmful effect granted on the enemy.

skills.name: Desperate Arrow
skills.description: Consumes half of your current HP to inflict damage that ignores the enemy's Defense. If your HP is full when it's your turn, [Desperate Arrow] cooldown time will reset.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and steals one beneficial effect with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Learn Knowledge (Passive)
skills.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you or an enemy is granted with a beneficial effect. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Forbidden Galdr
skills.description: Decreases the current HP of the enemy target (bosses excluded) by 10% for every Knowledge you have. If you have 5 Knowledge, decreases the target's MAX HP by 50% instead. After that, heals all allies by the decreased HP. This skill can be used when you have at least 1 Knowledge, and all Knowledge will be consumed once you use the skill.

skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with the flames of punishment, inflicting Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

skills.name: Holy Call
skills.description: Revives a dead ally target and fills up the ally's HP by 15%. Revives another ally with a 30% chance.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and steals one beneficial effect with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Gain Knowledge (Passive)
skills.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you're granted with a beneficial effect. Gains 3 Knowledge when an enemy or an ally gets defeated. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Start of Apocalypse
skills.description: Attacks the enemies in the order of low HP ratio to high HP ratio by the number of Knowledge you have, and the damage increases as you attack. If you have 5 Knowledge, destroys the enemy's MAX HP by 50% of the damage dealt. This skill can be used when you have at least 1 Knowledge, and all Knowledge will be consumed once you use the skill.

skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: Decelerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance on each target.

skills.name: Absorb Energy
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with spirit balls and recovers HP by 50% of the inflicted damage.

skills.name: Legacy of Knowledge (Passive)
skills.description: Attacks the enemy while ignoring the enemy's Defense by 15% for every Knowledge you have whenever you attack. skills.name: Dreamy Invitation
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Puts the target to Sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Recovers the Attack Bar by 50% if the enemy falls asleep after the attack.

skills.name: Twisted Joy
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Replaces up to 3 beneficial effects granted on the target with Sleep, Increased chances of landing a Glancing Hit, and Decrease DEF Effects for 2 turns each.

skills.name: Brutal End
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Attacks all enemies and increases their skill cooldown time by 2 turns. If the enemy is under Sleep, destroys the enemy's MAX HP by 50% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Dark Horn
skills.description: Attacks and Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 25% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

skills.name: Nature's Protection
skills.description: Creates a shield that's 30% of your MAX HP for 3 turns and creates a shield that's 20% of your MAX HP on all other allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Other Side of the Moon (Passive)
skills.description: Reflects 30% of the received damage back to the enemy. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Transformation: Human Form
skills.description: Transforms into a Human Form and you'll be able to use a new skill. The Attack Power will be increased proportionate to your MAX HP in Human Form, but your MAX HP will be decreased by 50%. Instantly gains another turn after the transformation.

skills.name: Sonic Boom
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a strong sonic boom and removes a beneficial effect with a 75% chance.

skills.name: Ice Blast
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with energy balls. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Bar by 30%. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: Inflicts damage proportional to the MAX HP to all enemies and reduces their Attack Bars by 30%.

skills.name: Sonic Boom
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a strong sonic boom and removes a beneficial effect with a 75% chance.

skills.name: Fire Blast
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with energy balls. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Bar by 30%. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a strong sonic boom and removes a beneficial effect with a 75% chance.

skills.name: Thunder Blast
skills.description: Attacks all enemies to decrease their Attack Speed for 2 turns. The damage of this skill will increase according to your MAX HP.

skills.name: Blessing (Passive)
skills.description: Reduces damage dealt by Fire attributes by 50%. [Automatic Effect]

skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a strong sonic boom and removes a beneficial effect with a 75% chance.

skills.name: Light Blast
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with energy balls. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Bar by 30%. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

skills.name: Punish (Passive)
skills.description: Your Attack Power and Defense increases by 20% each time you're attacked. This effect can stack up to 10 times. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Magic Arrow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a magical arrow which casts various harmful effects according to the attribute relation between you and the enemy. The damage of this effect increases by 15% for each harmful effect on the enemy.

skills.name: Wedge Arrow
skills.description: Drives in a wedge into all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Arrow of Water
skills.description: Attacks with 3 water arrows, each having a 15% chance to stun the enemy. The damage increases according to Defense.

skills.description: Unleashes an accurately aimed deadly thrust. This attack receives a 50% Critical Rate bonus.

skills.name: Massacre (Passive)
skills.description: The inflicted damage increases as the target enemy's HP decreases when attacking. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Iron Throw
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and reduces the Attack Bar by 30% with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Atlas Stone
skills.description: Throws the weapon up in the sky and shares damage with all enemies by the amount of your MAX HP on your next turn. This attack can't be counterattacked.

skills.name: Weight of Survival (Passive)
skills.description: You can't counterattack or attack together with other allies while the weapon is not in your hand, but your Defense will be increased by 50%. Also decreases the cooldown time when you're attacked. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Fake Attack
